common_0080_rival_01a:
That’s Sprigatito, a Grass-type Pokémon!\c
It can use its plant powers to soak up whatever
water you throw at it![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0080_head_teacher_01a:
Would you like to go with our good Grass-type
Pokémon Sprigatito here?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0080_rival_01b:
That’s Fuecoco, a Fire-type Pokémon!\c
The burning-hot sparks it scatters will fry any
and all plants in a flash![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0080_head_teacher_01b:
Would you like to go with our good Fire-type
Pokémon Fuecoco here?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0080_rival_01c:
That’s Quaxly, a Water-type Pokémon!\c
It may seem quiet, but its mighty streams of
water can put out any fire—you’ll see![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0080_head_teacher_01c:
Would you like to go with our good Water-type
Pokémon Quaxly here?[VAR 0114(000A)]
